setting.weather: Bright sun, ship rolling in swells

characters.appearance: Grizzled pirate, 40s, wounded leg, murderous eyes
characters.action: Raising knife to throw at boy in rigging

scene.mainElements: Life-or-death chase up ship's rigging as wounded pirate pursues boy with deadly intent
scene.details: Complex web of ropes and rigging, deck tilting with waves, blood trail from pirate's wounded leg, boy's pistols visible at his belt, sun glinting off raised knife blade, loose sails flapping, seabirds circling overhead
scene.background: Open ocean, distant island visible, no other ships in sight
scene.atmosphere: Mortal danger, cat and mouse in ship's rigging, boy's coming of age through violence

composition.cameraAngle: Dramatic upward angle showing both figures
composition.focus: Pirate's raised knife and boy's terrified determination
composition.depth: Pirate on deck foreground, boy climbing rigging middle height, sky and circling birds background
